controller

Class Checks

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Checks

  • public class Checks
extends java.lang.Object
    Support class that checks the validity of multiple actions
    Author:
    Stefano Martino, Marco Maria Ferrara

      • hasMaxPowerUp

        public static boolean hasMaxPowerUp(Player player)
        Checks if the player has the max number of powerUps
        Parameters:
        player - selected player
        Returns:
        the result is true if the player has 3 powerUps, false otherwise

      • drawnAmmo

        public static Ammo drawnAmmo(Ammo grabbedAmmo,
                             Ammo playerAmmo)
        Returns the number of ammos actually drawn from the picked up Ammo Card
        Parameters:
        grabbedAmmo - number of ammos drawn from an Ammo card
        playerAmmo - number of ammos the player holds
        Returns:
        the number of ammos actually drawn from the picked up Ammo Card

      • canReload

        public static boolean canReload(java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> weapon,
                                Ammo allAmmo)
        Checks if the player can reload one of his weapons
        Parameters:
        weapon - list of the reloadable weapons that the player holds
        allAmmo - Sum of players ammos and powerUps
        Returns:
        true if the player can reload, false otherwise

      • canUseFireMode

        public static boolean canUseFireMode(Player player,
                                     Weapon currentWeapon,
                                     java.lang.String effectType)
        Checks if the current player can use the selected Fire Mode
        Parameters:
        player - current player
        currentWeapon - weapon selected by the current player
        effectType - string that indicates the type of fire mode selected
        Returns:
        true if the fire mode is usable, false otherwise

        damage - the damage given to the opponent

      • verifyNewAction

        public static int verifyNewAction(Player player)
        Finds the available actions based on the amount of damage received by the player
        Parameters:
        player - current player
        Returns:
        an integer that indicated the set of actions available to the player

      • validPayment

        public static boolean validPayment(Player currentPlayer,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> choices,
                                   java.lang.String effectType,
                                   Model model)
        Checks if a selected payment is valid or not
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - current player in the game
        choices - integer that indicates the powerUps selected for a payment
        effectType - integer that indicates the type of fire mode selected
        model - instance of the Model class
        Returns:
        true if the selected payment is valid, false otherwise

      • checkValidRed

        private static boolean checkValidRed(int fireRED,
                                     int powerUpRED,
                                     int playerRED)
        Calculates if the sum of red powerups and red ammos is enough to pay the red fire mode ammo
        Parameters:
        fireRED - number of red cubes the current fire mode costs
        powerUpRED - number of red powerUp the current player holds
        playerRED - number of red cubes the current player holds
        Returns:
        returns true if the sum of red powerups and red ammos is enough to pay the red fire mode ammo, false otherwise

      • checkValidBlue

        private static boolean checkValidBlue(int fireBLUE,
                                      int powerUpBLUE,
                                      int playerBLUE)
        Calculates if the sum of blue powerups and blue ammos is enough to pay the blue fire mode ammo,
        Parameters:
        fireBLUE - number of blue cubes the current fire mode costs
        powerUpBLUE - number of blue powerUp the current player holds
        playerBLUE - number of blue cubes the current player holds
        Returns:
        returns true if the sum of blue powerups and blue ammos is enough to pay the blue fire mode ammo false otherwise
